title: $2,749 Three Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Utility Included: Heat, Hot water, Cooking gas, and water/sewer
Located at: 330 Tremont Street, Boston, MA 02116
Our community is located in Chinatown.
A multitude of employment, educational, cultural, medical, shopping, and public transit bus, subway and rail options exist within blocks of the community.

Local grocers, restaurants, bookstores, movie theaters, theaters, Tufts New England Medical Center, Josiah Quincy Elementary School, children and senior day care centers, and the beautiful Boston Common and Public Garden are all just steps away.
Please call/email for more information or an application.
Professionally managed by Trinity Management LLC
